name: Ready 2 Rumble: Revolution
overview: Grab a friend and get ready to rumble in Ready 2 Rumble Revolution for Wii. Pick an outrageously funny parody character or create your own boxer Use intuitive, instinctual boxing controls as you flatten your opponents with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk. Train to pummel your opponents in eight unique mini games. Become King of the Ring in Seven different gameplay modes.
